name: Mood Ring Generator
description: Generate a random mood ring color and its associated meaning with a click.  Relive the nostalgic fun of mood rings digitally!
features: Clickable button to generate a new mood color.
Display of the generated color using Tailwind CSS background utilities.
Display of the color's corresponding mood meaning.
Simple, clean design using Tailwind's pre-built components.
Option to copy the mood/color combination to the clipboard.

name: Geometric Pattern Generator
description: Create mesmerizing geometric patterns by adjusting sliders for size, color, and complexity. Download your unique design as an SVG.
features: Interactive sliders to control pattern parameters.
Real-time pattern generation in an SVG element.
Customizable color palettes using Tailwind CSS.
Download button to save the generated SVG.
Option to change the geometric shape (e.g., circles, squares, triangles).

name: Interactive Story Weaver
description: Craft branching narratives with a simple, visual interface. Explore different story paths and share your creations.
features: Drag-and-drop interface for connecting story segments.
Customizable text fields for each segment.
Visual representation of the story's branching structure.
Button to generate a shareable link encoding the story data.
Option to load stories from shared links.
raw_output:
Project Name: Interactive Story Weaver
Description: Craft branching narratives with a simple, visual interface. Explore different story paths and share your creations.
Features:
- Drag-and-drop interface for connecting story segments.
- Customizable text fields for each segment.
- Visual representation of the story's branching structure.
- Button to generate a shareable link encoding the story data.
- Option to load stories from shared links.
